Dialogue.Page: Hello, it is me, Leuc. I accidentally stumbled into some hidden node in space, and well, I found this cool spaceship!
This place is completely overgrown with cacti... I wonder what happened here!
There's this alien recorder looking thing here, but I don't speak French. Or read alien, for that matter.
Aw, look at this little cactus! So cute and miniature!
You, my little spiney one, will be my pet cat!
And I will love and adore you forever, and I will never lose you!
Now to get out of this place before the overgrown cacti block the entrance...
